name: repage
description: Extensions for page.js, a client-side micro-router

scripts.prepublish: mdextract -u Readme.md; (cat support/banner.js; browserify index.js --standalone page | uglifyjs -m) > repage.js
scripts.coverage: (cp index.js index.js~; jscoverage index.js; mv index-cov.js index.js; mocha -R html-cov > coverage.html); mv index.js~ index.js

author: Rico Sta. Cruz <hi@ricostacruz.com>
